video.title: House Hunters International Renovation
video.synopsis: Prospective homebuyers shop the globe to find abodes with serious potential, then renovate against all odds to make them move-in ready.

episodes.synopsis: Children's book authors from Connecticut renovate a home in Mallorca, where their family of five can experience Spain's history and culture.
episodes.title: Building a New Beginning

episodes.synopsis: Costs add up quickly when the Haidarian family's unique vision for their new home in Johannesburg proves to be more complicated than they expected.
episodes.title: Renovation in South Africa

episodes.synopsis: The Bents use an inheritance to buy a vacation home in France but find that their dream house has accumulated four centuries of necessary repairs.
episodes.title: Harsh Realities in France

episodes.synopsis: After living for many years in Australia, the Davies family moves to Amsterdam but has a very limited budget for their new home's renovations.
episodes.title: Renovate Once, Shame on You

episodes.synopsis: After renting in various locations all over the world, the Manasseh family decides to buy and renovate a home of their own in Brussels, Belgium.
episodes.title: First Purchase, First Project

episodes.synopsis: A couple experienced at refurbishing houses tackles a Serbian vacation home, which is difficult in a region plagued by material and labor shortages.
episodes.title: A Rural Renovation in Serbia

episodes.synopsis: Elisa and Giulio leave Australia to settle in the latter's sleepy Tuscan hometown but worry that their home won't be ready by their wedding day.
episodes.title: Renovating in Manciano, Italy
